item.title: A new species of extinct crocodile relative rewrites life on the Triassic coastline - Phys.org
item.description:
1. A new species of extinct crocodile relative rewrites life on the Triassic coastline  Phys.org
  2. 'What the Hell Is This?': Crocodile-Like Fossil Rewrites Triassic History  Newsweek
  3. Say hello to the surprising crocodile relative Benggwigwishingasuchus eremicarminis  Popular Science
  4. “What the hell is this?” Scientists amazed at prehistoric crocodile-like animal discovered in Nevada  BBC Discover Wildlife
